mapper.select: SELECT WORD_ID, WORD_NM, ENG_NM, WORD_DC, SYNONM, B.USER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM egovdb.COMTNWORDDICARYINFO A LEFT JOIN egovdb.COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID WHERE A.WORD_ID=#{wordId}

SELECT WORD_ID, WORD_NM, ENG_NM, WORD_DC, SYNONM, B.USER_NM EMPLYR_NM, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM egovdb.COMTNWORDDICARYINFO A LEFT JOIN egovdb.COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1=1
AND WORD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND ENG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
ORDER BY WORD_ID DESC
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM egovdb.COMTNWORDDICARYINFO A LEFT JOIN egovdb.COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1=1
AND WORD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
AND ENG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWrd}, '%')
